road trips

through Odisha

cuisines to

explore

The Crab Curry

Forget the shellers; Enrich your finger-licking experience on the spicy Crabs of chilika.

Read More

The Fish Curry

The natural sweetness of the Rohu (carp) leaves a lasting impression in a simple Macha Jhola (fish gravy)

Read More

The Pakhala

A bowl of pakhala & assorted dishes is just what you need to beat the heat.

Read More

Pitha

Satiate your sweet tooth with a delicious plate of Assorted Pitha

Read More

Mati Handi Mutton

Marinated with spices and simmered in an earthen pot

Read More

Rasagola

The delightful sweet dish Rasagola, is inherently associated with the tradition and heritage of Odisha.

Read More

Terms & Conditions
  • Cut off time of booking will be 12 hours.
  • Toll & Parking charges has to be borne by the customer on spot.
  • The vehicles can move up to permissible parking place at the destination and the customer have to walk from parking place to their destinations.
  • Cancellation of the booking will be made on payment of cancellation fee as prescribed in website.
  • Beyond the tour hour and coverage KM, extra amount will be charged as per the tariff.
